summary: Benjamin Peter James Bradshaw  is an English politician and the Member of Parliament for the Exeter constituency in the United Kingdom.
full_text:
Benjamin Peter James Bradshaw  is a British Labour Party politician who has been the Member of Parliament  for Exeter since 1997 and was the Secretary of State for Culture, Media and Sport from 2009 to 2010, Before entering politics he worked as a BBC Radio reporter.
^ "UK Parliament Website". Retrieved 2014-01-08. 
^ "Debrett's People". Retrieved 2014-01-08.
title: Ben Bradshaw
